cpri_mult.title: CPRI Mult
cpri_mult.description: Select the CPRI line bit rate in terms of multiple of option 1 (614.4 Mbps). E.g set 4 for option 3, 8 for option 5 and 16 for option 7.

cpri_rx_delay.title: CPRI RX Delay
cpri_rx_delay.description: Delays between TX and RX position in CPRI frame. This should be set to the value of (T2a + T3a - Toffset) provided by the RRH specification.

cpri_tx_delay.title: CPRI TX Delay
cpri_tx_delay.description: Advances Start of Frame relative to PPS to compensate for delays in transmit line and RRH. This should be set to T12 + T2a.

cpri_tx_dbm.title: CPRI TX dBm
cpri_tx_dbm.description: Optional floating points value in dBm (default 0). Needed by ENB/GNB to have a notion of actual output power. Computed from maximum power output of the RRH for a 0dBFS input signal (full scale).

ru_mac_addr.title: RU MAC address
ru_mac_addr.description: RU MAC address used for NETCONF

dl_nr_arfcn.title: DL NR ARFCN
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

ssb_pos_bitmap.title: SSB Position Bitmap
ssb_pos_bitmap.description: SSB position bitmap in bits (4, 8 or 64 bits depending on the DL frequency).

root_sequence_index.title: Root Sequence Index
root_sequence_index.description: Range 0 to 837 for PRACH format up to 3, 0 to 137 otherwise. prach-RootSequenceIndex parameter. It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

inactivity_timer.title: Inactivity Timer
inactivity_timer.description: Send RRC connection release after this time (in ms) of network inactivity.

user-authorized-key.title: User Authorized Key
user-authorized-key.description: SSH public key in order to connect to the SSH server of this instance.

gnb_id_bits.title: gNB ID bits
gnb_id_bits.description: Number of bits for the gNodeB global identifier. (range 22 to 32)

amf_list.title: AMF list
amf_list.description: Optionnal. List of AMF to which the gNodeB is connected

amf_addr.title: AMF Address
amf_addr.description: IP address (and optional port) of NGAP SCTP connection to the AMF. The default port is 38412.

plmn_list.title: PLMN list
plmn_list.description: List of PLMNs broadcasted by the gNodeB, at most 12 (default: 00101)

reserved.title: Reserved
reserved.description: True if the cell is reserved for operator use.

nr_handover_a3_offset.title: A3 offset for NR handover
nr_handover_a3_offset.description: RSRP gain offset between gNBs which will trigger handover

nr_handover_time_to_trigger.title: Time to Trigger for NR handover
nr_handover_time_to_trigger.description: Time to triger after which NR handover will be triggerd if A3 offset is reached

dl_nr_arfcn.title: DL NR ARFCN
dl_nr_arfcn.description: Downlink NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the neighbour cell

ssb_nr_arfcn.title: SSB NR ARFCN
ssb_nr_arfcn.description: SSB NR Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the neighbour cell

pci.title: Physical Cell ID
pci.description: Physical Cell ID of the neighbour cell

nr_cell_id.title: NR Cell ID
nr_cell_id.description: Concatenation of gnb_id and cell_id of the neighbour cell

gnb_id_bits.title: gNB ID bits
gnb_id_bits.description: Number of bits for the gNodeB global identifier. (range 22 to 32)

xn_addr.title: XN Address
xn_addr.description: XN Address of the neighbour cell (gNB Address)

websocket_password.title: Websocket password
websocket_password.description: Activates websocket for remote control and sets password

log_phy_debug.title: Physical layer log debug
log_phy_debug.description: Enable debug mode for physical layer logs

gps_sync.title: GPS synchronisation
gps_sync.description: True if GPS should be used for synchronisation

use_ipv4.title: Use IPv4
use_ipv4.description: Set to true to use IPv4 for AMF / MME addresses

gnb_stats_fetch_period.title: gNB statistics fetch period (seconds)
gnb_stats_fetch_period.description: Describes how often a call to Amarisoft remote API is made to get gNB statistics

gnb_drb_stats_enabled.title: Enable gNB drb statistics
gnb_drb_stats_enabled.description: Enable gNB drb statistics through 100Hz polling, needed for E-UTRAN IP Throughput KPI

max_rx_sample_db.title: Maximum RX sample value (dB)
max_rx_sample_db.description: Maximum RX sample threshold above which RX saturated promise will fail

min_rxtx_delay.title: Minimum available time for radio front end processing (ms)
min_rxtx_delay.description: Baseband latency promise will fail if minimum TX/RX diff reaches threshold (lower than this value)

xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.title: Address to Forward Xlog by Fluenbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_host.description: Address of Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server to Forward Xlog

xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.title: Port to Forward Xlog by Fluentbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_port.description: Optional Port of Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server to Forward Xlog

xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.title: Shared Key to Forward Xlog by Fluentbit
xlog_fluentbit_forward_shared_key.description: Secret Key Shared with Remote Fluentd or Fluentbit Server for Authentication when Forwarding Xlog
